member.name: N:
member.summary: Global namespace

member.name: N:Tools
member.summary: Root namespace for all tools in the ĐTools project

member.name: N:Tools.API
member.summary: Contains PInvoke (usually Win32 API) relates declarations (mainly modules containing declarations of external functions, structures and enumerations; most of them are declared friend)

member.name: N:Tools.API.Messages
member.summary: Contains publicly wisible declarations related to Windows window messages. Contains declarations of window messages constants and related wParam, lParam and return value constants.

member.name: N:Tools.API.Messages.lParam
member.summary: Contains declarations of constants used as values of lParam of windows messages.

member.name: N:Tools.API.Messages.Notifications
member.summary: Contains enumerations, structures and methods for working with windows notifications.
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.API.Messages.ReturnValues
member.summary: Contains declarations of constants used as return values of windows messages.

member.name: N:Tools.API.Messages.wParam
member.summary: Contains declarations of constants used as values of wParam of windows messages.

member.name: N:Tools.ApplicationServicesT
member.summary: Contains classes providing functionality related to application development
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.CodeDomT
member.summary: Contains classes that can be used to represent the elements and structure of a source code document.

member.name: N:Tools.CodeDomT.CompilerT
member.summary: Contains types for managing the generation and compilation of source
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.CollectionsT
member.summary: Contains various tools for working with collections - both - type-safe (generic and specialized) and type-unsafe. Also contains extension methods for collections.

member.name: N:Tools.CollectionsT.GenericT
member.summary: Contains generic collections-related tools. This includes interfaces for collections, new collection definitions and extension methods for working with generic collections.

member.name: N:Tools.CollectionsT.SpecializedT
member.summary: Contains specialzed (non-generic) collections-related tools. This includes extension methods and collection adapters for representing type-safe specialized collections as type-safe generic collections.

member.name: N:Tools.COM
member.summary: Contains declaration of COM-related classes, strucrures and enumerations

member.name: N:Tools.COM.ShellLink
member.summary: Contains COM declarations related to the class. Those declarations servers as code-behind for implementation of the class, a tool for manipulating *.LNK files.

member.name: N:Tools.ComponentModelT
member.summary: The namespace provides classes that are used to implement the run-time and design-time behavior of components and controls. This namespace includes the base classes and interfaces for implementing attributes and type converters, binding to data sources, and licensing components.

member.name: N:Tools.DataT
member.summary: Contains various classes for deling with databases and database data including data access and types to load to database engines.
member.version: Namespaces introduced to contain assemby Tools.SqlServer to be loaded to Microsoft SQL Server
This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.DataT.ObjectsT
member.summary: Contains classes related to Entity Framework
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.DataT.SchemaT
member.summary: Contains classes related to database schemas
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.DataT.SchemaT.DeployT
member.summary: Contains classes that can be uded to deploy database schemas
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.DiagnosticsT
member.summary: Provides classes and extension methods that allow you to interact with system processes, event logs, and performance counters.
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:DataT.SqlServerT
member.summary: Contains classes and tools related to Micosoft SQL Server
member.version: Namespaces introduced to contain assemby Tools.SqlServer to be loaded to Microsoft SQL Server

member.name: N:Tools.DataStructuresT
member.summary: Defines various data structures (other than collections). Provides data structure interfaces as well as actual implementations of them.
member.remarks: Data structures implemented in ĐTools project are usually generic, so they are placed in the namespace rather than directly in this.

member.name: N:Tools.DataStructuresT.GenericT
member.summary: Contains interfaces and implementations for various generic data structures other than collections.

member.name: N:Tools.DevicesT
member.summary: Contains classes for working with hardware devices such as keyboard

member.name: N:Tools.DevicesT.RawInputT
member.summary: Contains classes allowing consumption of raw input events from keyboard, mouse and other HID devices.

member.name: N:Tools.DiagnosticsT
member.summary: The namespace provides classes that allow you to interact with system processes, event logs, and performance counters.

member.name: N:DrawingT
member.summary: Contains drawing- and graphic-related tools. This includes actual tools for drawing graphis as well as tools for working with images (and image files) of different formats.

member.name: N:DrawingT.DesingT
member.summary: The namespace contains classes that extend design-time user interface (UI) logic and drawing.

member.name: N:Tools.DrawingT.DrawingIOt
member.summary: Contains tools for working with image file of different formats.
member.version: Namespace and all sub-namespaces relocated to newly created assemly Tools.Metadata

member.name: N:Tools.DrawingT.DrawingIOt.JPEG
member.summary: Contains tools for working with images in JPEG (JFIF) file format.

member.name: N:Tools.Experimental
member.summary: This namespace contains tools that are in very unstable stage of development. Those tools come from the Experimental.dll assembly.
member.remarks:
Everything in this namespace may be changed without noticing.
This namespace serves 2 purposes:
Incubator for tools in early development stage where it is not clear where the tool will fit and even if it will be created.
Temporary place for tools that are being adopted from another sources (i.e. my other projects). When the tools is changed so it fits to ĐTools project, it is moved to appropriate namespace and assembly.

member.name: N:Tools.Experimental.My
member.summary: Visual Basic-generated namespace My for assembly Experimental.dll.

member.name: N:Tools.Experimental.My.Resources
member.summary: Contains resources for the Experimental.dll assembly.

member.name: N:Tools.ExtensionsT
member.summary: Contains asorted extension methods.
member.remarks:
Collection-related extension methods can be found in (or and respectively) namespace. Concretely in modules , and . The namespace also contains extension methods for working with collections. Extension methods related to and are placed in the module. Reflection-related extension methods can be found in the module.
Another specialized extension methods may exist in specialized namespaces.

member.name: N:Tools.GlobalizationT
member.summary: The namespace contains classes that define culture-related information, including the language, the country/region, the calendars in use, the format patterns for dates, currency, and numbers, and the sort order for strings. These classes are useful for writing globalized (internationalized) applications.

member.name: N:Tools.InternalT
member.summary: Contains classes related to the ĐTools project itslef. This includes some attributes.
member.remarks: Attributtes , and are obsolete and should no longer be used. Use XML documentation tags instead.
member.version: Attributtes , and are obsolete and should no longer be used. Use XML documentation tags instead.

member.name: N:Tools.IOt
member.summary: The namespace contains types that allow reading and writing to files and data streams, and types that provide basic file and directory support.

member.name: N:Tools.LinqT
member.summary: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).
member.remarks: The LINQ technology is highly based on extension methods and because of it some are defined in this namespace. Another collection-related extension methods can be found in (or and respectively) namespace. Concretely in modules , and .

member.name: N:Tools.MetadataT
member.summary: Contains tools for working with (image) metadata (such as Exif or IPTC/NAA)

list.item: Namespace and all sub-namespaces relocated to newly created assemly Tools.Metadata

member.name: N:Tools.MetadataT.ExifT
member.summary: Contains classes related to reading and manipulating Exif metadata.
member.version: Types URational and SRational moved to namespace .

member.name: N:Tools.MetadataT.IptcT
member.summary: Contains classes realetd to reading and manipulating Iptc metadata.

member.name: N:Tools.MetadataT.IptcT.IptcDataTypes
member.summary: Contains classes and structures to represent data types used by IPTC metadata

member.name: N:Tools.Metanol
member.summary: Root namespace of the Metanol project - and Win exe application for manipulating IPTC data.

member.name: N:Tools.NumericsT
member.summary: Contains numeric types that complement the numeric primitives
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.ReflectionT
member.summary: Contains various reflection tools.
member.remarks: Tools related to and can be found in the module.

member.name: N:Tools.ReportingT
member.summary: Contains classes for generating reports
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.ReportingT.ReportingEngineLite
member.summary: Contains classes implementing a lightweight reporting engine capable of generating reports from data readers to various outputs
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.ResourcesT
member.summary: Contains tools for manipulating with resources as well as accessors ofr public resources in current assembly.
member.remarks: Highly specialized resources may be found in specialized namespaces. Another, usually private, resources may be found in the namespace.

member.name: N:Tools.RuntimeT
member.summary: Contains advanced types that support diverse namespaces
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.4

member.name: N:Tools.RuntimeT.CompilerServicesT
member.summary: Provides functionality for compiler writers who use managed code to specify attributes in metadata that affect the run-time behavior of the common language runtime
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.4

member.name: N:Tools.SecurityT
member.summary: Contain classes that represent security system and permissions.
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.SecurityT.CryptographyT
member.summary: Provides cryptographic services, including secure encoding and decoding of data, as well as many other operations, such as hashing.
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.SecurityT.CryptographyT.EncryptionT
member.summary: Provides a simple, string-oriented wrapper classes for encryption functions, including hashing, symmetric encryption, and asymmetric encryption.
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.SplashScreenGenerator
member.summary: Implements the Splash Screen Generator application capable of emmbedding assembly info to images
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.Tests
member.summary: Root namespace for the Tests.exe assemly which servers as test center for another tools.

member.name: N:Tools.TestsT
member.summary: Contains classes for performing various general-purpose tests.
member.remarks: Unlike namespace , which contains tests of classes created in the tools project, this namespace contains general- purpose test.

member.name: N:Toools.TextT
member.summary: Contains various text- and String-related tools.

member.name: N:Tools.TextT.EncodingT
member.summary: Contains classes fro working with different text encodings.

member.name: N:Tools.ThreadingT
member.summary: Provides classes and extensions related to multithreading applications
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.TotalCommanderT
member.summary: Contains classes for working with Total Commander file manager and implementing extensions for it.
member.version: Namespace introduced

member.name: N:Tools.TotalCommanderT.PluginBuilder
member.summary: Contains classes for building Total Commander Plugins
member.version: Class ExitCodeException removed due not being used anymore.

member.name: N:Tools.VisualBasicT
member.summary: Contains Visual Basic-specific tools.

member.name: N:Tools.VisualStudioT
member.summary: Contains classes specific to Microsft Visual Studio sach as Visual Studio enhancements, custom tools, visualizers etc.

member.name: N:Tools.VisualStudioT.GeneratorsT
member.summary: Contains various code generators.
member.version: Renamed from Tools.GeneratorsT to
Class ServiceProvider removed. Use instead.

member.name: N:Tools.VisualStudioT.GeneratorsT.ResXFileGenerator
member.summary: Contains classes implementing advanced RESX file generator
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3. Previously it was used only by ResXFileGenerator.exe assembly. Classes from DMKSoftware.CodeGenerators were moved there.

member.name: N:Tools.VisualStudioT.MacrosT
member.summary: Visual Studio macros
member.remarks:
Classes in this namespace are not provided as assembly. You can download source code from /DevelopmentTools/Macros and load *.vsmproj files to Microsft Visual Studio Macros IDE to utilize the functionality implemented in this namespace.
The Tools.VisualStudio.Macros.dll assemnly is not publicly available and is not intended to be used as compiled assembly.
To workaround a bug in Visual Studio 2010 which prevents Macro Explorer from seeing macros in nested namespaces (see https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/ViewFeedback.aspx?FeedbackID=464968) this namespace has different name in Macro projects - .
member.version: Namespace name in macro projects changed from to to workaround Visual Studio 2010 bug 464968. This change does not affect this documentation and (publicly not available) binary DLL with macros.

member.name: N:Tools_VisualStudioT_MacrosT
member.summary: Placeholder namespace for Visual Studio Macros to workaround Visual Studio bug.
member.remarks:
This namespace is used in Visual Studio Macro projects (vsmproj) instead of because there is a bug in Visual Studio that prevents Macro Explorer from seeing macros in nested namespaces. This namespace is not used in this documentation and (publicly not available) binary macros DLL. For details of classes in the reffer to the , please.
In case Microsft will ever fix this stupid bug (as of VS 2010 Beta 1 closed Won't Fix), this namespace will be renamed back to .
You can see bug details at https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/ViewFeedback.aspx?FeedbackID=464968.
member.version: Namespace introduced as workaround of Visual Studio bug 464968. This namespace is not used in this documentation and in (publicly not available) binary macros DLL.

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT
member.summary: Contains GUI-related tools for different technologies.
member.remarks: Unlike this namespace does not contain tools related to Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) directly. Those tools are stored in the namespace.
member.version: Whole namespace and all sub-namespaces with exception of relocated to newly created assembly Tools.Windows.

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.FormsT
member.summary: Contains tools related to Windows Forms (WinForms) GUI technology. This includes helper classes as well as WinForms controls.

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.FormsT.UtilitiesT
member.summary: Contains utility classes related to Windows Forms

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.FormsT.VisualStylesT
member.summary: Contains classes for rendering Windows Forms controls with and without visual styles
member.version: Namespace introduced
member.author: Đonny

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.FormsT.VisualStylesT.SpecializedNonThemedRenderers
member.summary: Contains specialized classes for rendeting controls without visual styles
member.version: Namespace introduced

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.FormsT.VisualStylesT.SpecializedSafeRenderers
member.summary: Contains specialized classes for rendeting controls both with and without visual styles
member.version: Namespace introduced

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.FormsT.VisualStylesT.SpecializedThemedRenderers
member.summary: Contains specialized classes for rendering controls with visual styles.
member.remarks: These classes does not work when Visual Styles are not available.
member.version: Namespace introduced

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.IndependentT
member.summary: Contains technology-independent (and thus usually abstract) classes related to GUI.

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.InteropT
member.summary: Contains classes for WPF - WinForms interoperability

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.NativeT
member.summary: Contains tools for manipulating native (unmanaged) Win32 windows via PInvoke

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.WPF
member.summary: Contains Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) related classes and tools

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.WPF.ControlsT
member.summary: Contains Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) controls.

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.WPF.ConvertersT
member.summary: Contains type and value converters for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF)

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.WPF.MarkupT
member.summary: Provides types to support serialization and Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). In particular, contains classes to support XAML markup extensions and other language concepts that are defined by the XAML specification, reader/writer implementation classes, serializers, and attributes that report XAML characteristics to reflection-based analysis.
member.version: Namespace introduced

member.name: N:Tools.WindowsT.WPF.ThreadingT
member.summary: Contains classes and extensions related to multithreading in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF)
member.version: This namespace is new in version 1.5.3

member.name: N:Tools.XmlT
member.summary: Contains XML-related tools

member.name: N:Tools.XmlT.LinqT
member.summary: Provides extensions to Linq to Xml technology.

member.name: N:Tools.XmlT.XPathT
member.summary: Contains XPath-related tools
